Title: NASS proposes November 2026 for next general elections
Summary: The National Assembly proposes that the 2027 presidential and governorship elections hold in November 2026, six months before the end of the current administration’s tenure .

Title: Defections: Makinde insists Nigerians hold ultimate verdict
Summary: Seyi Makinde insists Nigerians hold ultimate verdict on PDP . Oyo State Governor declares that despite the wave of defections rocking the opposition party .

Title: Vehicle manufacturer to build CNG plant in Bayelsa
Summary: INNOSON Vehicles Manufacturing (IVM) Limited has disclosed of plans to establish a Compressed Natural Gas (CNG) assembly plant in Bayelsa State .

Title: DIS renegotiates arms supply deal with Pakistan
Summary: Defence Industries System has sent a high-level delegation to Pakistan to sign a new contract for supply of aircraft, drones and armoured vehicles . Earlier agreement to purchase fighter jets and military equipment was suspended .

Title: More knocks for IMF, World Bank over water privatisation in Africa
Summary: More knocks for IMF, World Bank over water privatisation in Africa . As Africa begins its Water Week, the Bretton Woods institutions have been criticised for their alleged push for privatisation of water supply in Africa in the guise of reforms .

Title: Disaster management: Gov Lawal says Zamfara is committed to working with NEMA
Summary: Governor Dauda Lawal has reaffirmed the Zamfara State Government’s commitment to continuing its partnership with the National Emergency Management Agency (NEMA) Zamfra is committed to working with NEMA, says Lawal .

Title: NNPC, others hike fuel price to N955 per litre
Summary: The price of Premium Motor Spirit, PMS, increased by 6.8 percent to N955 per litre, from N890 per lorry sold last week . NNPC, others hike the price of petrol .

Title: Peter Obi to FG, states: Stop destroying people’s property
Summary: Peter Obi condemned demolition of private property by government agencies . He said state governments’ action was even more condemnable, based on the fact that most of them were carried out without prior notice . Peter Obi is the presidential candidate of Labour Party, LP, in the 2023 election .

Title: Banks’ deposit with CBN rises 568% to N146.13trn in 9 months
Summary: Banks’ deposit with the Central Bank of Nigeria, CBN, grew by 568.7 percent, YoY, to N146.13 trillion in the first nine months of the year (9m’25) from N21.85 trillion in 2024 . Trend analysis showed that banks’ deposits in SDF rose

Title: Dollar to Naira exchange rate today, October 14, 2025
Summary: Dollar to Naira exchange rate today, October 14, 2025 . Market data and FX trackers show the official (NFEM/CBN-linked) exchange rate traded in the mid-₦1,400s .
